entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Fort McMurray
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 a.m. MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 6.6Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort McMurray Airport 7:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 6.6°C
Pressure: 101.9 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 65 %
Dewpoint: 0.4°C
Wind: ESE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 9

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this morning. Local smoke. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this morning. High 20. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Local smoke. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low 12. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Sunday 7 May 2023
